body:
Hello guys, While running a simple energy simulation following the tutorials from Youtube so far I have found 2 issues:   1. 1. The simulation has not run correctly because of this severe error:
   ** Severe  ** Problem in interior solar distribution calculation (CHKBKS) That happened after running the energy simulation. I will attach the file and image I´m working with since maybe the geometry could be the problem. (Attached image)   2. Trying to visualize EP results in colored surfaces and one of my BREPS is ignored (Attached image) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/p9ey71ICjWcNk*elnzgUIbK2A0En-bGgRtjY9RQdHLddzLoXFnBq6gBEsfYV2RJLX-0B*prOnPCzr3q10UDfxF8wgMxQosg6/ignoredbrep.png)
topic: Energy simulation error and breps ignored
